mapper.insert: insert into t_business_info (ID, business_name, business_desc,business_phone business_operator, remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update t_business_info set business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_desc = #{businessDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_phone = #{businessPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_operator = #{businessOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_business_info set business_desc = #{businessDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_operator = #{businessOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_phone = #{businessPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, business_name, business_desc,business_phone, business_operator, remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from t_business_info where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, business_name, business_desc,business_phone, business_operator, remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from t_business_info

select ID, business_name, business_desc,business_phone, business_operator, remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from t_business_info where business_desc like '%' || #{businessDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
